high_descs: Turn around and go to the cabinet.
Pick up the candle from the top of the cabinet.
Walk to the front of the toilet on your left.
Place candle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Pick up candle from top of cabinet and place on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around completely and walk to the dresser.
Pick up the candle from the dresser,
Turn around to the right and turn again to face the toilet.
Place the candle on the back end of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle to the back end of a toilet.

high_descs: turn around and walk over to the left side of the cabinets at the end of the room
grab a candle off of the cabinets there
move to the left side of the room even more so to face the front of the toilet there
place the candle down on top of the back side of the toilet
anns.task_desc: place a candle down on top of the back side of the toilet
